Bcash is very nice BitcoinCash implementation made by the guys of Purse/bcoin https://github.com/bcoin-org/bcash About BitcoinCash is a upgrade of the Bitcoin Blockchain that forks at block 478558, and BitcoinCash / BCH is different to BitcoinCore / BTC
Franco Amati
@franamati
 ¬∑ Aug 16, 2018
Replying to @franamati @estebs and 2 others
Also, even the "official" Bcash's website said so:

"Is Bitcoin Cash different from 'Bitcoin'? Yes. It is a fork of the Bitcoin blockchain ledger, with upgraded consensus rules."

Source: http://archive.li/2wFkc
